alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 29 at 3:15PM EST until January 30 at 4:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM EST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester, Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM EST this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline..
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
